name: Zappy
body:
# Zappy

Hi!

Zappy is a wonderful game. In this game, you watch an artificial intelligence gathering resources in a virtual world. When a good amount of resources is reached, they call their friends and start elevation. The game is won when a group of characters elevated to the 8th level.

This a big project combining 4 different parts :
- A game server written in C
- An AI client written in OCaml
- A viewer written in C# with XNA (works on windows & windows phone 7)
- A drone written in python which allow human to interact with several AI client

We worked on it 2 month and 11 days our second year as students at [Epitech](http://www.epitech.eu/) Rennes and we had to make it from scratch (except for the "viewer" part). Here is out team :
* Benjamin Businaro
* Sullivan Lacheteau
* Quentin Leffray
* Ulric Lefevre
* Pierre Martin

Our [gallery](http://imgur.com/a/KRuV8).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
